scripts.start: eleventy --serve & npx tailwindcss -i src/styles/tailwind.css -c src/styles/tailwind.config.js -o docs/css/style.css --watch
scripts.build: ELEVENTY_PRODUCTION=true eleventy --pathprefix 'pages/marco-monteiro/rapid-prototyping' && NODE_ENV=production npx tailwindcss -i src/styles/tailwind.css -c src/styles/tailwind.config.js -o docs/style.css --minify
